decision_conditions: The submitted arboricultural report pursuant to condition 8 of planning permission ref: 212879FUL dated 23.02.2023 are deemed to be unsatisfactory and do not meet the requirements of the condition. The proposal would therefore fail to comply with policies G5 and G7 of the London Plan (2021), policy 5.10 of Ealing's Development Management DPD and Ealing's SPG 9 - Trees and Development Guidelines.
description: Submission of an arboricultural report in pursuant to condition 8 of planning permission ref: 216879FUL dated 23/02/2023 for 'Construction of a two-storey residential dwelling comprising two self-contained units, with associated parking, private amenity space, refuse and cycle storage; alteration to front and rear of property involving hard and soft landscape  (following demolition of existing dwelling and garage)'
